```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)

set.seed(10)

iris_with_missing = iris %>% 
  map_df(~replace(.x, sample(1:150, 20), NA)) %>%
  mutate(Species = as.character(Species))
```

```{r Problem 1}

iris_with_missing<-iris_with_missing %>%
  mutate(Sepal.Length=ifelse(is.na(Sepal.Length), mean(Sepal.Length, na.rm = TRUE) ,Sepal.Length)) %>%
mutate(Sepal.Width=ifelse(is.na(Sepal.Width), mean(Sepal.Width, na.rm = TRUE) ,Sepal.Width)) %>% #replacing the NAs in the column Sepal.Width with the average of values in that column 
mutate(Sepal.Width=ifelse(is.na(Sepal.Width), mean(Sepal.Width, na.rm = TRUE) ,Sepal.Width))
  
summary(iris_with_missing)
```
